summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 2.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12702 lux) and cloud levels (up 811 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14665 lux), cloud levels (up 1508 m), feels like temperature (up 5.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.8°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
